fulltext:
APPLICANT'S RESUME 
Position: Programmer 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Name: 
NGUYEN ANH TUAN 
Address: 
28 Tran Thu Do Street, Phu Thanh Ward, Tan Phu Dist, HCM City 
Tel: 
077 562 42 92 
Sex: 
Male 
Marital status: 
Married 
Date of Birth: 
02-05-1988 
Nationality: 
Vietnamese 
EDUCATION 
Time Duration 
Qualification & Name of Institution 
2008 – 2010 
The Academic Council of NIIT 
DNIIT (Software Engineering – Java Technologies) 
Rank: Good 
2006 - 2008 
Ly Tu Trong Technical College Ho Chi Minh city 
Major: Computer Networking 
2003 - 2006 
Tan Binh High School 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
Magento Developer 
Vida Likipe Co., Ltd 
(10/2015-Now) 
▪ 
Updating regularly Magento installation (both Magento 1 & 2) 
▪ 
Ensuring that existing functionalities continues to work properly 
▪ 
Modifying functionalities and layouts as customer’s requirements 
▪ 
Installing security patches 
▪ 
Developing new functionalities 
▪ 
Implementing front-end changes for both PC and mobile screens 
following Bootstrap 
Website Designer  
and Coding 
Caily Co., Ltd 
(11/2014-08/2015) 
▪ 
Coding website project for layout of PC & smartphone according 
to requirements of customers (bootstrap – responsive website, 
HTML, CSS, NOREN…) 
▪ 
Cutting images from psd files for designing and coding by 
photoshop 
▪ 
Checking, modifying HTML and CSS code based on standard 
formats of customer and company 
▪ 
Editing and adding data for website by using NOREN framework 
▪ 
Coding and synchronizing data with members of project teams by 
tortoiseSVN software 
▪ 
Coding functional website for managing projects in company 
▪ 
Researching for coding plugin for wordpress 
Web Designer  
and coding 
Rentracks Company 
(7/2012-10/2014) 
▪ 
Customizing card game for smartphones 
▪ 
Coding websites for smartphone (takayama, kaiketsu, tsumugi, 
....), animating websites with jquery(takayamaganka) 
▪ 
Researching and supporting about Google webmaster project 
▪ 
Coding functional website for checking & managing working 
times of company employees 
▪ 
Coding and designing system for importing data from csv files 
into database 
▪ 
Coding and designing for job_search_page system project 
▪ 
Testing and writing test case report for projects 
▪ 
Coding and designing for recruit_search_system project 
▪ 
Researching and supporting for another website projects of 
general company in Japan 
▪ 
Coding websites for Japanese customers 
▪ 
Coding website for Rat rocket game of company by using HTML, 
CSS, JQUERY 
Web Designer  
and coding 
DAH Company 
(3/2012-5/2012) 
▪ 
Designing, coding and operating framework based on MVC and 
OOP models 
▪ 
Setting up schedules for designing & assigning modules of 
projects to teammates 
▪ 
Designing and coding modules based on website’s requirements 
Web Designer 
Phuong Bac Company 
(11/2011-3/2012) 
▪ 
Designing website by Wordpress open source 
▪ 
Reporting job’s processes 
Web Designer  
and coding 
Phongcachso1  Copany. 
(03/2009-04/2010) 
▪ 
Analyzing and designing websites based on customer demand 
▪ 
Designing website by Dreamweaver software and PHP, HTML, 
Javascript 
▪ 
Designing databases by mySQL software 
▪ 
Designing interfaces by photoshop and Swishmax software 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
Skills 
▪ 
Source Code: C, C++, C#, VB, JAVA, JAVASCRIPT, PHP, HTML, 
CSS, MySQL, jquery, SASS, LESS 
▪ 
Coding and designing website based on MVC 
▪ 
Coding proficiency OOPS in designing website 
▪ 
Coding on frameworks: Magento, Zend, Wordpress, Noren 
▪ 
Managing database systems by vertrigo, xampp 
▪ 
Synchronizing data by tortoiseSVN software 
▪ 
Using and coding plugin for Wordpress, extension for Magento 
▪ 
Analyzing and designing databases based on website’s 
requirements 
▪ 
Being able to use FLASHFXP software, Photoshop, SwishMax, 
Flash, FileZilla, Subversion (Git/SVN) 
▪ 
Checking and fixing perfect pixels for layout (css & html) 
▪ 
Being able to write & communicate in English 
Personal  Characteristics 
▪ 
Sense of responsibility, hard-working and careful person 
▪ 
Be eager to learn new things to improve my knowledge of 
website design and layout 
▪ 
Be willing to take challenges & be adaptable to new working 
environment 
▪ 
Be able to work under high pressure, independence and team 
▪ 
Good at analyzing & organizing skills 
Awards and Social 
Activities 
▪ 
Certificate of excellent karatedo coach for 5 years in Tan Phu 
Dist, HCMC 
▪ 
Certificate of national karatedo coach, referee of HCMC 
▪ 
Joining in activities of sports, entertainments likes: playing flute, 
painting manga, metal craft assembly model, gundam assembly, 
playing the puzzle adventure video games
